page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
The majority of people in our area live in the new housing development on the eastern edge of Dronfield. In order to gain information about where people travel for their employment a primary school sited in the new housing development was asked to help by collecting information about where parents travelled to work.
The results were:
{*********************************** {* }Number travel{* {* } to work {* {*}Sheffield 116 {* {*}Dronfield 64 {* {*}Chesterfield 10 {* {*}Other (including 70 {* {* }unemployed) {* {***********************************
